NomaiObject:
<color=orange>Excavation Site</color>
1
CASSAVA: My love, are you alright? Why did your voyager disappear so suddenly?
2
1
DAZ: I am well, Cassava! I was simply disconnected from my voyager. I am currently trying to voyage to <color=orange>Lovers' Cove's</color> projection pool again, but I seem unable to..
3
1
DAZ: Ah, could it be.. Cassava, is the sun orbiting over <color=orange>Lovers' Cove</color> right now?
4
3
CASSAVA: Oh, I believe so - the sun rose over the horizon not long ago. But how could that have caused the voyager stone's disconnection?
5
4
DAZ: Ah, I should not be surprised, then! The voyager dissolves when immersed in bodies of water, you see.
6
5
CASSAVA: The waves caused by the sun must be washing high enough on this island to submerge my voyager, dissolving it!
7
6
CASSAVA: I see.. In that case, we shall need to keep these waves in mind whenever we voyage to Giant's Deep!
Cove EX5 5
